title: Can we rebalance the game without absurd life steal?
body: I'm sorry, but there is nothing okay or balanced about an ADC healing 200+ per hit.

replies.body: There is nothing okay or balanced about a Tank 2 shotting an ADC.
im ok with lifesteal, since you have to sacrifice other stats in order to get it
Yeah... There's totally nothing balanced about it other than the fact a stun stops those hits, letting you explode them instantly.

Can't we cap it like normal people?

40% CDR?

Why not
